story.title: OUR STORY
story.subtitle: Founded in 2020, Zagreb Rugby Ladies emerged from a simple belief.
story.description1: Today, we're proud members of the Croatian Rugby Federation, with over 30 active players ranging from complete beginners to experienced athletes. Our club has become a cornerstone of women's rugby in Croatia, inspiring other cities to start their own teams.
story.description2: But our greatest achievement isn't our wins on the field—it's the confidence, friendships, and personal growth our players develop.

myths.label: Truth Check
myths.title: Myths vs
myths.description: Debunking common misconceptions about rugby sevens

items.myth: Rugby sevens is just sprint rugby
items.reality: While faster, rugby sevens requires strategic thinking, skill, and endurance. The open space creates opportunities for creative play.

items.myth: Only super fit athletes can play
items.reality: Rugby sevens welcomes all fitness levels. The shorter game time and smaller teams mean more opportunities for everyone to contribute.
The simplified format with fewer players makes rugby sevens easier to understand. The action is exciting but the rules remain the same.
Women's rugby sevens is Olympic sport showcasing incredible skill, speed and athleticism. It's one of the most exciting formats to watch and play.

faq.label: Common Questions
faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Everything you wanted to know about getting started

items.question: Is rugby sevens safe for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely! Rugby sevens has strict safety protocols and the faster pace actually promotes skillful play over heavy contact. Our coaches prioritize safety and teach proper technique from day one.

items.question: Do I need to be super fit to play sevens?
items.answer: Rugby sevens welcomes all fitness levels. The 7-minute halves mean everyone gets rest, and there are positions that suit different attributes - from pace to power. Fitness develops naturally through training.

items.question: What equipment do I need?
items.answer: For beginners, just comfortable athletic wear and running shoes or rugby boots. The club provides balls and training equipment. Optional protective gear like mouth guards are available as you progress.

items.question: Can I start playing sevens with no experience?
items.answer: Yes! Many players find sevens easier to learn with fewer players and more space. Our beginner-friendly training sessions teach fundamentals step by step in a supportive environment.

items.question: How is women's sevens different from men's?
items.answer: The rules are identical, and women's sevens is an Olympic sport showcasing incredible skill and athleticism. The game emphasizes speed, strategy, and teamwork with equally competitive and exciting play.

items.question: What's the time commitment?
items.answer: We train twice a week with matches on weekends. Training sessions are 90 minutes. You can attend as many sessions as your schedule allows, and we welcome players who can't make every session.
